entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with rain showers changing to flurries before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
